thread.title: Exclusive CSI: Cyber Sneak Peek: Is Love in the Air?

author: TV Guide
title: Exclusive CSI: Cyber Sneak Peek: Is Love in the Air?
text: Exclusive CSI: Cyber Sneak Peek: Is Love in the Air? Prepare to feel the love on Sunday's CSI: Cyber.As you can see in the sneak peak above, Avery (... Comment   TV Guide Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 11:08 AM Updated at 2:24 PM Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 11:08 AM Updated at 2:24 PM Prepare to feel the love on Sunday's CSI: Cyber . As you can see in the sneak peak above, Avery ( Patricia Arquette ) quickly deduces that her two blackhat hackers Nelson ( Shad Moss ) and Raven ( Hayley Kiyoko ) may be spending more time together than usual outside of work. "Those two are leaving in separate elevators," she tells D.B. Russell ( Ted Danson ). "They never used to do that. They are dating!" Why CSI: Cyber will scare the crap out of you Although D.B. voices concerns that a pair of blackhats dating violates the deal they made with the FBI when they joined Avery's team, Avery is a little more forgiving. "They only have each other," she says. "Everyone deserves to get laid." That said, Avery isn't sure the fling will last. "Nelven is a very improbable match," she says, bestowing the couple with a proper 'shipper name. And just wait until you see how confused D.B. is by the idea of portmanteaus. Check out the clip above and watch CSI: Cyber Sunday at 10/9c on CBS. (Full disclosure: TVGuide.com is owned by CBS.) Other Links From TVGuide.com
